name: Jack and the Sodor Construction Company
original_name: Jack and the Sodor Construction Company
overview:
A spin-off of Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends, Jack & the Sodor Construction Company (or Jack and the Pack) was developed by producer Phil Fehrle in 2003. It did not receive a release until 2006 when it was released direct to DVD. The reason why the spin-off was never taken further seems to be because HiT Entertainment did not want it to conflict with their own series Bob the Builder when it bought the rights to Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends in 2002.

US DVD released as "On Site with Thomas and Other Adventures" containing six episodes and UK DVD released as "Thomas' Trusty Friends" containing eleven episodes of the series.
